/api.onProxyRes: function(proxyRes, req, res) { proxyRes.headers['Access-Control-Allow-Origin'] = '*'; proxyRes.headers['Access-Control-Allow-Methods'] = 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS'; proxyRes.headers['Access-Control-Allow-Headers'] = 'X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Authorization, x-api-key'; }
